Content:
# üéØ Project Setup Guide

Welcome to the project! This guide will help you quickly get started by installing the required tools and configuring your local environment.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Prerequisites

Ensure the following tools are installed on your system:

- [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/tools/install)
- [Solana CLI](https://docs.solana.com/cli/install-solana-cli-tools)
- [Anchor](https://anchor-lang.com/docs/installation)

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è **Recommended Anchor version:** `0.30.1`

---

## ‚úÖ Check Versions & Set Config

Verify that everything is properly installed and configured:

```bash
rustc --version             # Check Rust version
solana --version            # Check Solana CLI version
anchor --version            # Check Anchor version

solana config get           # View current Solana config
solana config set --url devnet  # Set network to devnet
```
Translation:
# üéØ Gu√≠a de Configuraci√≥n del Proyecto

¬°Bienvenido al proyecto! Esta gu√≠a te ayudar√° a comenzar r√°pidamente instalando las herramientas requeridas y configurando tu entorno local.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Requisitos Previos

Aseg√∫rate de tener instaladas las siguientes herramientas en tu sistema:

- [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/tools/install)
- [Solana CLI](https://docs.solana.com/cli/install-solana-cli-tools)
- [Anchor](https://anchor-lang.com/docs/installation)

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è **Versi√≥n recomendada de Anchor:** `0.30.1`

---

## ‚úÖ Verificar Versiones y Configurar

Verifica que todo est√© instalado y configurado correctamente:

```bash
rustc --version             # Verificar versi√≥n de Rust
solana --version            # Verificar versi√≥n de Solana CLI
anchor --version            # Verificar versi√≥n de Anchor

solana config get           # Ver verificaci√≥n de configuraci√≥n actual de Solana
solana config set --url devnet  # Configurar la red a devnet
```

Content:
---

## üîê Wallet Setup

Generate and manage your wallet keys:

```bash
solana-keygen new -o ./keys/admin.json     # Generate a new keypair
solana-keygen pubkey ./keys/admin.json     # Get public key
solana balance ./keys/admin.json           # Check wallet balance
solana airdrop 5 YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -u devnet   # Airdrop 5 SOL to your wallet
```

---

## üì¶ Project Installation

Clone the project and install dependencies:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/project-repo.git
cd project-folder
yarn
```
Translation:
---

## üîê Configuraci√≥n de la Wallet

Genera y administra las claves de tu wallet:

```bash
solana-keygen new -o ./keys/admin.json     # Generar un nuevo par de claves
solana-keygen pubkey ./keys/admin.json     # Obtener la clave p√∫blica
solana balance ./keys/admin.json           # Consultar el saldo de la wallet
solana airdrop 5 YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS -u devnet   # Airdrop de 5 SOL a tu wallet
```

---

## üì¶ Instalaci√≥n del Proyecto

Clona el proyecto e instala las dependencias:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/project-repo.git
cd project-folder
yarn
```

Content:
---

## ‚ö° Quick Start

### üèóÔ∏è Build the Program

Compile the Anchor smart contract:

```bash
# Build the Anchor program using nightly toolchain
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build

# Sync all program public keys
anchor keys sync

# Rebuild if the program address in lib.rs has changed
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build
```

---
Translation:
---

## ‚ö° Inicio R√°pido

### üèóÔ∏è Compilar el Programa

Compila el contrato inteligente de Anchor:

```bash
# Compilar el programa de Anchor usando la toolchain nightly
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build

# Sincronizar todas las claves p√∫blicas del programa
anchor keys sync

# Volver a compilar si la direcci√≥n del programa en lib.rs ha cambiado
RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN="nightly-2024-11-19" anchor build
```

---

Content:
### üß™ Test on Devnet

Ensure your `Anchor.toml` uses Devnet:

```toml
[provider]
cluster = "https://api.devnet.solana.com"
```

---

### üöÄ Deploy the Program

```bash
anchor deploy
```

---

## üß™ Use CLI to Interact with the Program
Translation:
### üß™ Prueba en Devnet

Aseg√∫rate de que tu `Anchor.toml` use Devnet:

```toml

cluster = "https://api.devnet.solana.com"
```

### üöÄ Despliega el Programa

## üß™ Usa la CLI para Interactuar con el Programa

Content:
Use these CLI scripts to interact with your smart contract locally.

---

### üîπ Initialize the Program

```bash
yarn script config
```

Initializes the contract configuration.

---

### üîπ Create a Round

```bash
yarn script create -t <ROUND_TIME> -d <MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT> -j <MAX_JOINER_COUNT>
Translation:
Utiliza estos scripts CLI para interactuar con tu contrato inteligente localmente.

---

### üîπ Inicializar el Programa

```bash
yarn script config
```

Inicializa la configuraci√≥n del contrato.

---

### üîπ Crear una Ronda

```bash
yarn script create -t <ROUND_TIME> -d <MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT> -j <MAX_JOINER_COUNT>

Content:
# Example:
yarn script create -t 60 -d 100000000 -j 100
```

**Parameters:**

- `<ROUND_TIME>`: Duration of the round in seconds (e.g., `60` = 60s).
- `<MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT>`: Minimum deposit in lamports (1 SOL = 1_000_000_000). Must be greater than `config.TEST_INITIAL_MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT`.
- `<MAX_JOINER_COUNT>`: Maximum number of participants. Must be less than `config.TEST_INITIAL_MAX_JOINER_COUNT`.

---

### üîπ Join a Round

```bash
yarn script join -a <DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT> -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Example:
yarn script join -a 100000000 -g 2
```
Translation:
# Ejemplo:
yarn script create -t 60 -d 100000000 -j 100
```

**Par√°metros:**

- `<ROUND_TIME>`: Duraci√≥n de la ronda en segundos (por ejemplo, `60` = 60s).
- `<MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT>`: Dep√≥sito m√≠nimo en lamports (1 SOL = 1_000_000_000). Debe ser mayor que `config.TEST_INITIAL_MIN_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT`.
- `<MAX_JOINER_COUNT>`: N√∫mero m√°ximo de participantes. Debe ser menor que `config.TEST_INITIAL_MAX_JOINER_COUNT`.

---

### üîπ Unirse a una ronda

```bash
yarn script join -a <DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT> -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Ejemplo:
yarn script join -a 100000000 -g 2
```

Content:
**Parameters:**

- `<DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT>`: Deposit amount in lamports (e.g., 0.1 SOL = 100_000_000).
- `<ROUND_NUMBER>`: Index of the round to join. Starts from `0`. Must be less than `total_round`.

> üïí Note: The countdown for the round starts when the second participant joins.

---

### üîπ Select Winner

```bash
yarn script winner -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Example:
yarn script winner -g 2
```

**Note:** Only call this after the round time has fully elapsed.

---
Translation:
**Par√°metros:**

- `<DEPOSIT_SOL_AMOUNT>`: Monto del dep√≥sito en lamports (por ejemplo, 0.1 SOL = 100_000_000).
- `<ROUND_NUMBER>`: √çndice de la ronda a la que unirse. Comienza desde `0`. Debe ser menor que `total_round`.

> üïí Nota: La cuenta regresiva para la ronda comienza cuando el segundo participante se une.

---

### üîπ Seleccionar Ganador

```bash
yarn script winner -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Ejemplo:
yarn script winner -g 2
```

**Nota:** Solo ejecuta esto despu√©s de que el tiempo de la ronda haya transcurrido completamente.

---

Content:
### üîπ Claim Winnings

```bash
yarn script claim -g <ROUND_NUMBER>

# Example:
yarn script claim -g 2
```

**Note:** This must be run by the winning wallet after the winner has been selected.

---
